graphenbib

Class MapGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphenbib.MapGraph

  • public class MapGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno This is the representation of a graph. It contains MapNodes and MapEdges. The graph is stored as Map of nodes (using their unique IDs as keys). This class provides some functions that are recursively called in the whole structure - may be slow on huge graphs!

                       throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
